data.name: Lights Out
data.detailed_description:
Lights Out is a 4v1 online multiplayer horror game, similar to the likes of Dead by Daylight.

In Lights Out, you have two roles: the scientists or the monster. The scientists are trapped in a laboratory where a monster is roaming around, trying to kill them all. The scientists must figure out a way to escape, before they get killed.

The Scientists:
They're stuck in the laboratory, and the exit is blocked off by the monster's tentacles, so the scientists have to trace the tentacle's weakspot, and cut it right open. This will cause the tentacles blocking the exit to retract, though be warned, for it angers the monster, giving it a speed boost and better vision. Once all of the tentacles have been cut, the scientists can escape the laboratory.

The Monster:
It was stuck in a test tube for ages, only for it to be tested on by scientists over and over again... but now it's time for it's revenge. Kill all of the scientists, as they are the ones who trapped you in there. Though to start off with, your speed and vision may not be that good, but as they hurt you through your tentacles, it will cause you to become angrier, allowing you to see more.

Progression System:
As you progress through the game, you level up, giving you skill points to upgrade the scientist and monster's respective skill trees, which can allow you to do certain things easier and more efficiently. This adds to the game's replayability, and allows certain players to be able to help other players, who may be lacking in certain skill tree areas.

data.short_description: Lights Out is a 4v1 online multiplayer horror game, similar to the likes of Dead by Daylight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: I think any processor will do
  • Graphics: I think any graphics card will do
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
